titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on certain textile spinning machines.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S9553)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 7/27/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1995, the duty on certain textile spinning machines.
